text:
Hi Artem, HubSpot only allows for a contact to be associated to one company at a time. I think you're better served by a couple of options:
1. Create the accountants as companies and attach their clients as the contacts.
2. Create a custom object for the accountants' associated clients.
Thanks Dan, will look into that! :slightly_smiling_face: <@U01MNMH6PKK> FYI
